data.Name: Mavi
data.Bio: There are several artists named Mavi. 1) Mavi (born October 7th, 1999) is a rapper from Charlotte, North Carolina who remained fairly unknown until October 18th, 2019 with the drop of his phenomenal album, let the sun talk. He also gained a lot of attention from a feature he did on Earl Sweatshirtâ€™s FEET OF CLAY on the track "EL TORO COMBO MEAL". 2) Turkish rapper Mavi Read more on Last.fm
